revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Fritzbox 6840 lte left de.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless LTE Home Server |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://web.archive.org/web/20161005070850/https://en.avm.de/products/fritzbox/fritzbox-6840-lte/technical-data/ |sp = https://en.avm.de/service/fritzbox/fritzbox-6840-lte/overview/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = AVM_FRITZ!Box_6840_LTE |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = AVM |model = FRITZ!Box 6840 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = LTE (HW177) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N450 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = LTE router, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Lantiq (Intel);PSB 80920;XWAY VRX288, PSB 80920 EL V1.1; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 34Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 500 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;HY27UF081G2A-TPCB; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L2006EM1I-12G; |flash2size = 256 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Lantiq;PEF 7071V;PEF 7071V V1.3; |eth3chip = Lantiq;PEF 7071V;PEF 7071V V1.3; |sw_cpu = true |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C0:25:06 |oui = C0:25:06
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = 4G LTE, SIM Card slot, DECT, FXS port |addchip = 2.4/5GHz WLAN Front-End/Power Amplifier;Skyworks (SiGe);SE2595L;;3; ,,, DECT/CAT-iq Controller;Dialog Semiconductor;SC14441;dialog, SC14441, C52R101QNC, W3X084.00, 1637JHAB;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/24/2011 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9380;AR9380-AL1A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Altair FourGee LTE Mini-PCIe UE |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = <!-- Number of transmit radio chains, Leave blank if unknown --> |rad2rxchains = <!-- Number of receive radio chains, Leave blank if unknown --> |rad2sstreams = <!-- Number of spatial data streams, Leave blank if unknown --> |rad2stand = LTE |rad2freq = <!-- 2.4 or 5, Frequency band(s) of this radio -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== * {{boxmatrix|6840}} <!-- https://boxmatrix.info/wiki/FRITZ!Box_6840_LTE --> :RAM: 128MB - S-Flash: 0.25MB - NAND-Flash: 128MB :Modem: ''Altair FourGee LTE Mini-PCIe UE'' (LTE Cat.3)
